==== esDecorators-classDeclaration-parameterDecorators.ts (10 errors) ====
    declare let dec: any;
    
    class C {
        constructor(@dec x: any) {}
                    ~
!!! error TS1206: Decorators are not valid here.
        method(@dec x: any) {}
               ~
!!! error TS1206: Decorators are not valid here.
        set x(@dec x: any) {}
              ~
!!! error TS1206: Decorators are not valid here.
        static method(@dec x: any) {}
                      ~
!!! error TS1206: Decorators are not valid here.
        static set x(@dec x: any) {}
                     ~
!!! error TS1206: Decorators are not valid here.
    }
    
    (class C {
        constructor(@dec x: any) {}
                    ~
!!! error TS1206: Decorators are not valid here.
        method(@dec x: any) {}
               ~
!!! error TS1206: Decorators are not valid here.
        set x(@dec x: any) {}
              ~
!!! error TS1206: Decorators are not valid here.
        static method(@dec x: any) {}
